mapper.select: SELECT ifnull(m.mem_image,"") mem_image, ifnull(m.mem_position,"") mem_position, ifnull(m.mem_dept,"") mem_dept, ifnull(m.mem_company,"") mem_company ,m.mem_seq, m.mem_email, m.mem_cert, m.mem_delcheck, m.mem_name, t.team_allow FROM t_team t, t_mem m where t.project_seq = #{seq} and t.mem_seq = m.mem_seq order by team_allow asc;
mapper.update: update t_team set team_allow = #{teamAllow} where mem_seq = #{memSeq} and project_seq=#{projectSeq}
mapper.insert: insert into t_team (team_seq, project_seq, mem_seq, team_allow) values ((select nextval('team_seq') from dual), #{pSeq},#{mSeq},2);
mapper.select: select * from t_team where project_seq=#{pSeq} and mem_seq=#{mSeq};
select * from t_team where project_seq=#{pSeq} and mem_seq=#{mSeq};
mapper.delete: delete from t_team where project_seq=#{projectSeq} and mem_seq=#{memSeq};
